abstract: Doctor Siyabonga Sangweni (born 29 September 1981 in Empangeni, KwaZulu-Natal), known as Siyabonga Sangweni, is a South African soccer defender for Premier Soccer League club Orlando Pirates and South Africa. His younger brother Thamsanqa Sangweni plays for Mamelodi Sundowns.
comment: Doctor Siyabonga Sangweni (born 29 September 1981 in Empangeni, KwaZulu-Natal), known as Siyabonga Sangweni, is a South African soccer defender for Premier Soccer League club Orlando Pirates and South Africa. His younger brother Thamsanqa Sangweni plays for Mamelodi Sundowns.
name: Doctor Siyabonga Sangweni
